items.label: 57682ac55457a3c015d4b921
items.name: Residential TOU Service Rate
items.description:
This Rate is available to Residential Customers using the Company's standard, single phase service through a single meter including not more than 2,000 watts of non-residential connected load served through the same meter. 


The included rate is a summation of the following charges:Distribution Charge, NUG Charge, Energy Efficiency and Conservation Charge, Default Service Support Charge, Universal Service Charge, Solar Photovoltaic Requirements Charge, Phase II Energy Efficiency and Conservation Charge. 

An additional charge of $1.79 per month will be assessed for Smart Meter Technologies.
items.energycomments:
Rider A Tax Adjustment Surcharge 
Rider C Universal Service Cost Rider
Rider F  Phase II Energy Efficiency and Conservation Charge
Rider G Smart Meter Technologies Charge 
Rider J  Default Service Support Charge
Rider K  Time of Use
Rider N  Solar Photovoltaic Requirements Charge
Rider P Non-Utility Generation Charge
